title: Bug 11314: Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
OB: In the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress), when entering 'com.ibm.foobar' it is replaced with 'co~.ib~.foobar'. This behavior is unexpected as package name compression should only replace a fragment if the compressed name is actually smaller. In this example, 'com.' should not be replaced since 'co~.' has the same length and contains less information.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application and navigate to the preferences section.
2. Locate the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field.
3. Enter 'com.ibm.foobar' in the field.
4. Observe that it is replaced with 'co~.ib~.foobar', which is unexpected.
